name: Commando Mission Sniper Shoot2
description:
Commando Mission Sniper Shoot 2
In this game you are army commando warrior loaded with sniper's is going on a war against mafia gangsters terrorists and thieves who are fully trained you have saved your self and kill the enemies to save your life.
In elite commando sniper, the total number of levels are eight.Commando is loaded with two different kinds of a sniper.
Make each shot count, hit your target in the right area as otherwise they will get alerted and start firing back at your position.
You can aim the enemies from the distance by hiding your self from the enemies so you can complete the given mission without dying.
In this game on each level, the number of enemies is different with the different techniques of training so be care full on each level to save your life for the accomplished of the mission which is given to you.
In this game, you can become a great commando sniper with stunning and accurate controls.
Kill out the enemies soldiers that occupy the area to secure it and make to safe for your allies to get through with helping the civilians.
